name: RM - Aesthetic - Vaporwave
prompt: surreal vaporwave aesthetic of {prompt} . digital degradation, pastel cyan and pink gradients, glitch distortions, nostalgic consumerist vibe, retro-digital haze, synthetic textures, lo-fi VHS artifacts, surreal abstraction

name: RM - Aesthetic - Synthwave (Outrun)
